## Lese inn filer med read_delim()

```{r}
data <- read_delim("https://zenodo.org/record/837902/files/unpaywall_100k.csv.gz", delim = ",")

data %>%
  View()

oa_data <- data %>%
  group_by(license) %>%
  filter(
    n() > 2000,
    !is.na(license)
    ) %>%
  select(-best_open_url, -random) %>%
  ungroup()
```

```{r}
oa_data %>%
  group_by(publisher, oa_color_long) %>%
  summarise(antall = n()) %>%
  filter(antall > 10) %>%
  View()
```
